attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taking 2p off the 22% tax rate does not compensate the lowest paid workers and pensioners who will lose out from doing away with the 10% tax band.The increases in personal allowances are not enough to make any difference. It is a regressive move and really does nothing to "simplify" the income tax regime.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
